hints.label: thm-composition-standalone
hints.title: Composition of Kinetic and Cloning Operators
hints.content:
4792: :label: thm-composition-standalone
4793: 
4794: For the composed operator $\Psi_{\text{total}} = \Psi_{\text{clone}} \circ \Psi_{\text{kin}}$:
4795: 
4796: $$
4797: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
4798: $$
4799: 
4800: where:
4801: $$
4802: C_{\text{total}} = C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2})
hints.raw_directive:
4789: ## Section 3: Composition
4790: 
4791: :::{prf:theorem} Composition of Kinetic and Cloning Operators
4792: :label: thm-composition-standalone
4793: 
4794: For the composed operator $\Psi_{\text{total}} = \Psi_{\text{clone}} \circ \Psi_{\text{kin}}$:
4795: 
4796: $$
4797: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
4798: $$
4799: 
4800: where:
4801: $$
4802: C_{\text{total}} = C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2})
4803: $$

hints.label: proof-composition-standalone
hints.content:
4808: :label: proof-composition-standalone
4809: 
4810: **Step 1**: Apply kinetic operator:
4811: 
4812: $$
4813: \mu_t \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{kin}}} \mu_{t+1/2}
4814: $$
4815: 
4816: By Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-kinetic-lsi-standalone`:
4817: 
4818: $$
4819: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)
4820: $$
4821: 
4822: **Step 2**: Apply cloning operator:
4823: 
4824: $$
4825: \mu_{t+1/2} \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{clone}}} \mu_{t+1}
4826: $$
4827: 
4828: By Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-cloning-contraction-standalone`:
4829: 
4830: $$
4831: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2)
4832: $$
4833: 
4834: **Step 3**: Compose:
4835: 
4836: $$
4837: \begin{aligned}
4838: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) &\leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) [(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)] + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2) \\
4839: &= (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}})(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
4840: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}) + \tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
4841: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
4842: \end{aligned}
4843: $$
4844: 
4845: where we absorbed $\tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}$ into $O(\tau^2)$.
4846:
hints.raw_directive:
4805: :::
4806: 
4807: :::{prf:proof}
4808: :label: proof-composition-standalone
4809: 
4810: **Step 1**: Apply kinetic operator:
4811: 
4812: $$
4813: \mu_t \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{kin}}} \mu_{t+1/2}
4814: $$
4815: 
4816: By Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-kinetic-lsi-standalone`:
4817: 
4818: $$
4819: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)
4820: $$
4821: 
4822: **Step 2**: Apply cloning operator:
4823: 
4824: $$
4825: \mu_{t+1/2} \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{clone}}} \mu_{t+1}
4826: $$
4827: 
4828: By Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-cloning-contraction-standalone`:
4829: 
4830: $$
4831: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2)
4832: $$
4833: 
4834: **Step 3**: Compose:
4835: 
4836: $$
4837: \begin{aligned}
4838: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) &\leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) [(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)] + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2) \\
4839: &= (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}})(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
4840: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}) + \tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
4841: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
4842: \end{aligned}
4843: $$
4844: 
4845: where we absorbed $\tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}$ into $O(\tau^2)$.
4846: 
4847: $\square$
